title: 8-9 Computing series
description:
m(n) = 4(1 - 1/3 + 1/5 - 1/7 + 1/9 - ... -1/(2n-1) + 1/(2n+1))
Write a function that returns m(n) with the following function head.

double pi(int n)
author: 程序设计I Chapter5 Functions
hint: You should submit the implementation of the function but do not submit the main() function.
